org.mitre.synthea.modules.covid

Class C19Vaccine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.synthea.modules.covid.C19Vaccine

  • public class C19Vaccine
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides information on the currently Emergency Use Authorized (EUA) vaccines in the United States. It also provides functionality to select a vaccine based on national usage statistics.

    Note that the Pfizer vaccine has received full approval from the FDA, so technically it is no longer under EUA.

    • Constructor Detail

      • C19Vaccine

        public C19Vaccine(java.lang.String display,
                  java.lang.String cvx,
                  boolean twoDose,
                  double usagePercentage,
                  long timeBetweenDoses)
        Create an instance of a COVID-19 Vaccine by supplying information on it.
        Parameters:
        display - The display text for the vaccine
        cvx - The CVX code for the vaccine
        twoDose - Should be true if the vaccine requires two doses
        usagePercentage - What percentage of Americans have received this vaccine
        timeBetweenDoses - For two dose vaccines, milliseconds between doses. 0 for one dose vaccines.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
        Initialize the class level information on vaccination. Needed so that selectShot will work.

      • selectShot

        public static C19Vaccine.EUASet selectShot(Person person)
        Select a vaccine to be used for an individual.
        Parameters:
        person - to vaccinate
        Returns:
        a vaccine to use
